com.cloudera.labs.envelope.derive

Interface Deriver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataQualityDeriver, DistinctDeriver, ExcludeDeriver, InListDeriver, MorphlineDeriver, NestDeriver, PassthroughDeriver, PivotDeriver, SelectDeriver, SQLDeriver

    public interface Deriver
extends Component
    Derivers create new DataFrames derived from DataFrames already loaded into the Spark application. Custom derivers should directly implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(Config config)
      Configure the deriver.
      Dataset<Row> derive(Map<String,Dataset<Row>> dependencies)
      Derive a new DataFrame from the DataFrames of the dependency steps.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure(Config config)
        Configure the deriver. This is called once by Envelope, immediately after deriver instantiation.
        Parameters:
        config - The configuration of the deriver.

      • derive

        Dataset<Row> derive(Map<String,Dataset<Row>> dependencies)
             throws Exception
        Derive a new DataFrame from the DataFrames of the dependency steps.
        Parameters:
        dependencies - The map of step names to step DataFrames.
        Returns:
        The derived DataFrame.
        Throws:
        Exception
